item.title: 网络安全公司 F5 披露遭民族国家黑客攻击，称运营未受影响
item.description: 网络安全公司 F5 周三表示，该公司检测到一个高度复杂的民族国家威胁分子未经授权访问了公司的某些系统，但这次入侵事件没有对公司运营造成影响。【原文：Cybersecurity firm F5 said on Wednesday it had detected unauthorized access to certain company systems by a highly sophisticated nation-state threat actor, but the breach had no impact on its operations.】

item.title: Archer Aviation 将以 2100 万美元收购 Lilium 的 300 项专利组合，股价大涨
item.description: 空中出租车公司Archer Aviation周三表示，该公司已在竞标中胜出，以1800万欧元（2091万美元）的价格收购了竞争对手Lilium公司约300项先进空中交通专利资产组合，从而将自己的专利资产组合扩大到1000多项。【原文：Air taxi firm Archer Aviation on Wednesday said that it has won a bid to acquire rival Lilium's portfolio of about 300 advanced air mobility patent assets for 18 million euros ($20.91 million), expanding its own portfolio to over 1,000 patent assets.】

item.title: 市场松了一口气，但法国的财政之火仍在燃烧
item.description: 法国的金融市场正在经历几十年来最严重的政治危机之一，如同坐过山车，虽然市场情绪正在好转，但颠簸的旅程还没有结束。【原文：France's financial markets are riding a roller-coaster as the country grapples with one of its worst political crises in decades, and while sentiment is improving, the bumpy ride is not over.】

item.title: 马牌动力总成与 Leapmotor、奇瑞和江淮汽车合作开拓全球市场，高管如是说
item.description: 发动机开发商马牌动力总成公司一位高管周三表示，该公司正与中国汽车制造商跃马汽车、奇瑞汽车和江淮汽车合作开发汽车项目，以开拓中国以外的全球市场。【原文：Engine developer Horse Powertrain is working on vehicle projects with Chinese automakers Leapmotor , Chery and Jianghuai Automobile to tap global markets outside China, an executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 苹果推出搭载更强大 M5 芯片的设备
item.description: 苹果公司周三发布了一系列产品更新，包括焕然一新的 MacBook Pro、iPad Pro 和第二代 Vision Pro 耳机，因为它在面向创意专业人士的设备中采用了最新的 M5 芯片。【原文：Apple unveiled a series of product updates on Wednesday, including a refreshed MacBook Pro, an iPad Pro and a second generation of the Vision Pro headset, as it embeds its latest M5 chip across devices aimed at creative professionals.】

item.title: 消息人士称诺和诺德开始在美国进行新一轮裁员
item.description: 据一封电子邮件和两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，诺和诺德制药公司已开始在其最重要的市场--美国进行一轮裁员，受影响的员工将在本周至下周收到通知。【原文：Drugmaker Novo Nordisk has begun a round of layoffs in its most important market, the United States, with affected staff set to be notified between this week and next, according to an email and two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 首尔高级官员：韩美关税谈判取得 "有意义的进展
item.description: 韩国最高政策顾问周三表示，韩国和美国在有关3500亿美元对美投资的谈判中取得了 "有意义的进展"。【原文：South Korea and the United States made "meaningful progress" in negotiations over $350 billion of investments in the U.S. that Seoul pledged in a deal reached in July to secure reduced U.S. trade tariffs, Korea's top policy adviser said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本、西班牙和韩国就不可持续的铜加工费提出警告
item.description: 日本、西班牙和韩国周三发表了一份罕见的联合声明，对铜处理和精炼费（TC/RCs）的暴涨深表担忧，并警告说在目前的条件下，冶炼厂和采矿商都无法持续发展。【原文：Japan, Spain and South Korea issued a rare joint statement on Wednesday expressing deep concerns over tumbling copper treatment and refining charges (TC/RCs), warning both smelters and miners cannot develop sustainably under current conditions.】

item.title: 贝森特将在感恩节后向特朗普推荐 3 或 4 位美联储主席候选人
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，他计划向唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提出三到四位美联储领导人的候选人，让他在感恩节后的某个时间进行面试。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday said he plans to present three or four candidates to lead the Federal Reserve to President Donald Trump for him to interview sometime after Thanksgiving.】

item.title: 由于汽车保险需求增加，保险公司 Progressive 第三季度利润上升
item.description: Progressive 公司周三公布第三季度利润增长，得益于汽车保单的强劲需求。【原文：Progressive Corp reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by strong demand for its auto insurance policies.】

item.title: 芝加哥联储：美国 9 月份除汽车外的零售额可能再次增长
item.description: 芝加哥联储周三公布的数据显示，9月份美国除汽车及零部件外的零售额可能进一步增长，尽管部分增长可能反映了物价上涨。【原文：U.S. retail sales excluding motor vehicles and parts likely posted further gains in September, data from the Chicago Federal Reserve showed on Wednesday, though part of the rise probably reflected higher prices.】

item.title: 仓库租赁强劲，Prologis季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受仓储设施需求强劲的推动，以仓储为主业的房地产投资信托公司 Prologis 周三公布的第三季度营收和运营资金均超出华尔街预期。【原文：Warehouse-focused real estate investment trust Prologis beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and funds from operations on Wednesday, helped by robust demand for its storage facilities.】

item.title: 贝森特：美国赤字与国内生产总值之比仍有下降空间
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，美国赤字与国内生产总值的比率还有下降到 3% 的空间。【原文：The U.S. deficit-to-gross domestic product ratio has room to come down to the 3% range, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织对全球公共债务高企敲响警钟，敦促各国建立缓冲机制
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周三表示，预计到2029年，全球公共债务将超过国内生产总值的100%，达到1948年以来的最高水平，并将继续攀升，该组织敦促各国建立缓冲机制以防范经济风险。【原文：Global public debt is projected to rise above 100% of gross domestic product by 2029, reaching its highest level since 1948 and continuing to climb, the IMF said on Wednesday, urging countries to build up buffers to guard against economic risks.】

item.title: 中美贸易紧张局势升级对泰国经济增长构成巨大风险--央行副行长
item.description: 泰国央行副行长表示，中美贸易紧张局势的新一轮爆发对泰国经济增长前景构成了巨大风险，并补充说，进一步降低利率的空间已经所剩无几。【原文：The fresh flare-up in trade tensions between the United States and China is a big risk to the outlook for Thailand's economic growth, the country's deputy central bank governor said, adding there was little room left to lower rates further.】

item.title: 贝森特：美国投资热潮是可持续的
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，对美国经济的投资浪潮是可持续的，而且才刚刚开始，但联邦政府关门正日益成为一个障碍。【原文：The wave of investment into the U.S. economy is sustainable and is only getting started, but the federal government shutdown is increasingly an impediment, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）战略主管：美国和中国仍致力于全球债务工作
item.description: 美国和中国的高级官员将参加周三举行的全球主权债务圆桌会议，会议的一个重要议题是银行贷款缺乏透明度，这使发展中国家的债务重组工作变得更加复杂。【原文：Top U.S. and Chinese officials will join Wednesday's meeting of the Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, where a key topic will be the lack of transparency about bank loans that have complicated developing countries' debt restructuring efforts.】

item.title: 诺和诺德与 Omeros 签订价值 21 亿美元的许可协议，共同推动罕见病领域的发展
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）和奥默罗斯（Omeros）周三表示，双方已签署了一项价值高达 21 亿美元的许可协议，以获得这家美国公司正在开发的治疗罕见血液和肾脏疾病的实验性药物。【原文：Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk and Omeros have signed a licensing deal worth up to $2.1 billion for the U.S.-based company's experimental drug, which is being developed for rare blood and kidney disorders, they said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 孤星公司将以 23 亿美元将 Hillenbrand 私有化
item.description: 投资公司 Lone Star Funds 以 23 亿美元现金将 Hillenbrand 私有化，这使得这家工业设备制造商的股价在早盘交易中大涨约 19%。【原文：Hillenbrand is being taken private by investment firm Lone Star Funds for $2.3 billion in cash, sending the industrial equipment maker's shares surging about 19% in early trading.】

item.title: 美元树公司预测 2026 财年盈利乐观，重申年度目标
item.description: 美元树公司（Dollar Tree）周三预测 2026 财年的利润将高于华尔街的预期，并维持其年度目标，这表明市场对平价杂货和必需品的需求稳定。【原文：Dollar Tree on Wednesday forecast fiscal 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates and upheld its annual targets, signaling steady demand for affordable groceries and essentials.】

item.title: 标普全球斥资 18 亿美元收购私募市场公司 With Intelligence
item.description: S&P Global 公司周三表示，该公司已同意收购私募市场数据提供商 With Intelligence 公司，以拓展其为快速增长的金融服务领域提供的产品。【原文：S&P Global has agreed to buy private markets data provider With Intelligence, the company said on Wednesday, as it looks to expand its products for the fast-growing segment of financial services.】

item.title: 美国银行是 First Brands 破产贷款人之一，首席财务官称贷款有担保
item.description: 美国银行首席财务官阿拉斯泰尔-博思威克（Alastair Borthwick）周三表示，美国银行是破产的美国汽车零部件供应商First Brands的贷款财团之一，但这些贷款有强有力的抵押支持。【原文：Bank of America is among a consortium of lenders to bankrupt U.S. auto parts supplier First Brands, but the loans are backed by strong collateral, Chief Financial Officer Alastair Borthwick said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 麻省理工学院衍生公司 Vertical Semiconductor 为人工智能动力芯片技术融资 1100 万美元
item.description: 从麻省理工学院（Massachusetts Institute of Technology）分拆出来的创业公司垂直半导体公司（Vertical Semiconductor）周三表示，该公司筹集了 1100 万美元资金，用于将芯片技术商业化，以便更高效地为人工智能服务器供电。【原文：Vertical Semiconductor, a startup spun out of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, on Wednesday said it raised $11 million in funding to commercialize chip technology that can deliver electricity to artificial intelligence servers more efficiently.】

item.title: 美国地区性银行 PNC 因利息收入和费用增加而利润大增
item.description: 受利息收入增加和费用全面飙升的推动，PNC Financial 周三公布第三季度利润增长超过 21%。【原文：PNC Financial reported a more than 21% rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by higher interest income and across-the-board jump in fees.】

item.title: 据财新网报道，字节跳动旗下豆瓣网涉嫌违规被调查
item.description: 中国财经媒体《财新网》在周三的一篇报道中称，TikTok 中文版的在线支付服务 "豆印支付 "因涉嫌违反规则而正在接受调查，该报道随后从其网站上撤下。【原文：Douyin Pay, the online payment service for the Chinese version of TikTok, is under investigation for an alleged rule breach, Chinese financial media outlet Caixin said in a report on Wednesday that was later taken down from its website.】

item.title: 贝莱德与英伟达支持的集团达成 400 亿美元数据中心交易，助推人工智能热潮
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）、英伟达（Nvidia）、xAI 和微软（Microsoft）等公司周三表示，一个投资财团将收购 Aligned Data Centers，交易价值 400 亿美元。【原文：An investment consortium that includes BlackRock , Nvidia , xAI and Microsoft will acquire Aligned Data Centers in a deal worth $40 billion, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 雅培收入不及预期，诊断设备需求疲软
item.description: 雅培公司本周三公布的季度营收低于分析师预期，原因是诊断和营养品业务的疲软未能抵消对医疗器械的强劲需求。【原文：Abbott's quarterly revenue fell short of analysts' expectations on Wednesday, as weakness in its diagnostics and nutritional businesses failed to offset strong demand for its medical devices.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利因投资银行业务复苏而利润大增
item.description: 摩根士丹利第三季度利润增长，原因是其投资银行家的交易量回升。【原文：Morgan Stanley's profit rose in the third quarter as its investment bankers rode a resurgence in dealmaking.】

item.title: Stellantis 在美国的 130 亿美元投资计划赢得投资者和分析师的认可
item.description: 投资者和分析师周三表示，Stellantis 公司在美国的 130 亿美元新投资计划标志着对抗唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统征收关税和重振汽车制造商在其主要市场销售的关键一步。【原文：Stellantis' new $13 billion investment plan in the U.S. marks a key step to countering tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump and to reviving the automakers' sales in its main market, investors and analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷制造 "工厂关闭，为 Milei 带来更多挑战
item.description: 几十年来，Lumilagro 公司凭借其标志性的钢制或玻璃保温杯在阿根廷人中大受欢迎，阿根廷人经常用这种保温杯装热水来冲泡马黛茶，马黛茶是当地无处不在的花草茶。【原文：For decades, Lumilagro rode to prosperity on the popularity of its signature steel or glass thermoses Argentines use to carry hot water to make mate, the locally ubiquitous herbal tea.】
